7. Clarifying the Number of Articles, Many or Few. The lower robe has five panels, one long and one short.

all four long and one short.

Fourth, regarding the wearing and use, there are many disputes in the world.
Now I will clarify it.
In ancient times in this land, everyone wore the jiasha.
Until the Later Wei Dynasty,
it was first added with a right sleeve.
The two sides were sewn together,
called a biased shirt.
The collar was cut and the hem was opened.

Therefore, we know that the left shoulder of the biased shirt,

The right side is the shoulder cover.
Now people are confused about this.
And on top of the biased shirt,
they add the shoulder cover again.
